After a brief sojourn in Telecoms, Sarah returned to retail, spending the subsequent 11 years with Sainsbury’s. After joining the Sainsbury’s Customer Insight team, Sarah quickly found her rightful home within Location Planning. details.description:
Sarah, a Mathematics and Economics graduate, started out in the Customer Insight team at Boots where she worked on pricing models and ground-breaking customer analysis following the launch of Advantage Card. After a brief sojourn in Telecoms, Sarah returned to retail, spending the subsequent 11 years with Sainsbury’s. After joining the Sainsbury’s Customer Insight team, Sarah quickly found her rightful home within Location Planning. Sarah progressed to lead the team during an exciting period when space growth and her team’s ambitious strategy was a key driver of Sainsbury’s success.In 2012, Sarah Hitchcock joined GeoLytix as Operations Director, bringing with her 15 years experience of working in Customer Insight and Network Planning teams in the retail sector.
